document_data.mainbody:
House Valwater was one of the noble families of Cormyr. It had an estate in the Vast Swamp, along the Way of the Manticore. It had a bad reputation due to one of its members trying to poison King Foril Obarskyr I.
* Lady Mersha Valwater
* Jerrick Valwater, Lady Mershas eldest son. Jerrick served a prison sentence in Wheloon for the attempted assassination of King Foril. He was the founder of the Ladys Marauders gang who controlled part of the town.
* Lord Delshan Valwater, Lady Mershas youngest son.
